discourse_list.title: Build your own PFP with Maker badge!

content.content: My dear friend @urbanisierung built a little PFP generator during the last weeks which is going to launch on mainnet on 2022-03-31T15:00:00Z. Why am I even bothering you with this? Because he was kind enough to also include a Maker-Badge in the generator so you are able to create something like this:  As I did some testing I was having access to a special link to mint before the launch. I am happy to share it with you, so you can be ahead of the wave - no financial advice  The app takes a origination fee of 0.005 ETH, no royalties on opensea. Enjoy!

Thanks for sharing @ultraschuppi! Although it is not in the context of DeFi or Maker I’m totally happy about the post! A few words about the background. I had three main reasons why I started this project:  I’m a total generative arts fan and wanted to build something again that has (at least a little bit) to do with art. I became aware of CryptoPunks super late, but I liked the punks themselves. To be honest: not for todays price   I wanted to do another project that interacts with a smart contract, and deploy on mainnet for the first time.  I always appreciate feedback! The elements are not set in stone: If anyone has requests for more elements or improvements I’m happy to add them. Have fun with the punks!

This is cool and a great way to get people to talk about Maker. I’m sure people (especially in the NFT community) will ask what that little thing in the upper right hand corner is, which will be a perfect time to possibly onboard and educate!
How nice, I like to see these initiatives, I’ll try it for sure hehehe

OMG <<> Thanks so much! FIRE! Love this and the Maker badge is great.
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
